name: halwa chebakia
ingredients: 125 g of golden and ground sesame seeds
1 tea glass of ½ melted butter and ½ neutral oil
2 tea glasses of orange blossom water
1 teaspoon of dry roasted and ground anise
1 bowl of golden sesame seeds (for decoration)
steps: Mix the flour, ground sesame, spices, salt, and yeasts. Add the melted butter/oil mixture, the egg yolk, and the orange blossom water. Knead. Form balls.
Roll out the dough thinly. Cut rectangles and use a pastry wheel to create 5 strips inside (leave the edges intact).
Shape the chebakia into a rose shape (braid the strips and pinch opposite corners to seal).
Fry in hot oil until golden.
Drain and immediately dip them in warm honey.
Decorate with golden sesame seeds. Serve cold.
